I am choosing OOppttiioonn AA:: RReeccoonnssttrruucctt tthhee JJuummbblleedd PPDDFF because it directly addresses a critical pain point in the mortgage industry where Value AI Labs operates,
demonstrating both technical depth and business understanding.
Mortgage companies frequently encounter shuffled PDF pages during document processing. This creates operational overhead and potential errors in loan
Building an intelligent PDF reconstruction tool that leverages OCR, Natural Language Processing, and machine learning to automatically detect, analyze, and reorder
shuffled document pages into their logical sequence.
